item.title: About
item.description: Hi there My name is Michael Trip and i run Linuxbase.nl. This site will be my personal blog about my every day job as a devops / Linux system administrator. I will also be posting things that personally interest me a lot, like virtualization, Ansible, and Software defined radio. For my professional website please visit Michaeltrip.nl. I hope you will enjoy my website. Greetings, Michael

item.title: Homelab
item.description: My homelab On this page i will share my current homelab setup. Stay tuned ;-)
